name: @essentialib/datetime
description: template repository for convert to es5 (compatible with kakaotalk bot)

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir dist --extensions ".ts,.js" --copy-files --ignore "*.json" && npm run set-dist-true
scripts.build-js: babel src --out-dir dist --extensions ".js" --copy-files --ignore "*.json,*.d.ts" && npm run set-dist-true

author: rhseung
